document.heading: Urban Farming and Food Security Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-248, the “Urban Farming and Food Security Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-677. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 18, 2014, and December 17, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 26, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 20-599 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-248 became effective April 30, 2015.
